title: The development (1) in agriculture zone around (1) any functional railway station upto a distance of 500 m
clause_text: The development (1) in agriculture zone around (1) any functional railway station upto a distance of 500 m. shall be permitted by charging premium at 30% rate of the said land as mentioned in the ASR on total area of land under development, subject to following -

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
